Articles.Content:
A concept of a field-buildable, fixed position drill rig for low-density ore fields, where normal drilling would be tedious. Has a couple hours of runtime on the drills with the fuel cells fired up and full tanks. I'll update this post with a few more bits and crafts as they get finished up and posted.

http://kerbalx.com/MaverickSawyer/Drill-Rig.craft
Looks nice. Would you like to post the mods you've used?
